INHERITORS AT LAST.\97Not until the personal advent of Christ can His people receive the kingdom. . . . Man in
54
his present state is mortal, corruptible; but the kingdom of God will be incorruptible, enduring forever. Therefore man in his present state cannot enter into the kingdom of God. But when Jesus comes, He confers immortality upon His people; and then He calls them to inherit the kingdom of which they have hitherto been only heirs.\97GC 322, 323.
